flawed_nl_solution:
Before Samuel walked across the porch, there were 331 - 223 = <<331-223=112>>112 dust particles.
Those 112 were 1/10 of the original amount, so there were 112 * 10 = <<112*10=1120>>1120 dust particles on the porch before Samuel swept.
#### 1120

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 108, not 112. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
